bradleyross.local.databases

Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.library.database.DatabaseProperties
      • bradleyross.local.databases.DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends DatabaseProperties
    Information for connecting to databases on my laptop. See https://babbage.inf.unibz.it/trac/obdapublic/wiki/ObdalibPluginJDBC.

    Postgres Port 5432

    Author:
    Bradley Ross
